original_text: As for me, I have not hastened from being a pastor to follow thee: neither have I desired the woeful day; thou knowest: that which came out of my lips was right before thee.
korean_text: 나는 목자의 직분에서 물러가지 아니하고 주를 따랐사오며 재앙의 날도 내가 원하지 아니하였음을 주께서 아시는 바라 내 입술에서 나온 것이 주의 목전에 있나이다

sentences.original_text: As for me, I have not hastened
from being a pastor to follow thee:
neither have I desired the woeful day;
that which came out of my lips
